<h1 align="center">

<p align="center">
  I'm Balazs, a 19-year-old software developer from Hungary. I have a passion for creating software that makes people's lives easier and more enjoyable. I love to learn new technologies and improve my skills. I enjoy working on projects that challenge me and allow me to grow as a developer.
</p>
